functional
Unary_FunctionBase object struct for unary functor, that is one that takes just one argument and has one result.
Types
arg
Binary_FunctionBase object struct for binary functor, that is one that takes two arguments and has one result.
Types
arg1
arg2
ret
EqualA functor returning true if two given arguments are equal.
Not_EqualA functor returning true if two given arguments are not equal.
GreaterA functor returning true if the left value is greater than the right one.
LessA functor returning true if the left value is less than the right one.
Greater_EqualA functor returning true if the left value is greater or equal than the right one.
Less_EqualA functor returning true if the left value is less or equal than the right one.

This is version 2 of the file.

functional

namespace functional

Unary_Function

template<typename T, typename U> struct Unary_Function

Base object struct for unary functor, that is one that takes just one argument and has one result.  Unused currently.

Summary
Types
arg

Types

arg

Binary_Function

template<typename T, typename U, typename V> struct Binary_Function

Base object struct for binary functor, that is one that takes two arguments and has one result.  Used by multiple functors.  Arguments can be of different types, too.

Summary
Types
arg1
arg2
ret

Types

arg1

arg2

ret

Equal

template<typename T, typename U> struct Equal: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>

A functor returning true if two given arguments are equal.

Not_Equal

template<typename T, typename U> struct Not_Equal: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>

A functor returning true if two given arguments are not equal.

Greater

template<typename T, typename U> struct Greater: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>

A functor returning true if the left value is greater than the right one.

Less

template<typename T, typename U> struct Less: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>

A functor returning true if the left value is less than the right one.

Greater_Equal

template<typename T, typename U> struct Greater_Equal: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>

A functor returning true if the left value is greater or equal than the right one.

Less_Equal

template<typename T, typename U> struct Less_Equal: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>

A functor returning true if the left value is less or equal than the right one.

namespace functional
template<typename T, typename U> struct Unary_Function
Base object struct for unary functor, that is one that takes just one argument and has one result.
template<typename T, typename U, typename V> struct Binary_Function
Base object struct for binary functor, that is one that takes two arguments and has one result.
template<typename T, typename U> struct Equal: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>
A functor returning true if two given arguments are equal.
template<typename T, typename U> struct Not_Equal: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>
A functor returning true if two given arguments are not equal.
template<typename T, typename U> struct Greater: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>
A functor returning true if the left value is greater than the right one.
template<typename T, typename U> struct Less: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>
A functor returning true if the left value is less than the right one.
template<typename T, typename U> struct Greater_Equal: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>
A functor returning true if the left value is greater or equal than the right one.
template<typename T, typename U> struct Less_Equal: Binary_Function<T, U, bool>
A functor returning true if the left value is less or equal than the right one.
